## cohort extractor
#### 1. study_population_no_COVID

```{r }

dat=read_csv(here::here("output","input_noCOVID.csv"),
             col_types=cols_only(
               age=col_double(),
               sex=col_character()
             ))
dat %>%
  tbl_summary(
    statistic = list(
      all_continuous() ~ "{min}, {max}",
      all_categorical() ~ "{n} ({p}%)"))
rm(dat)
```
